body:
Don't forget --no - clean, otherwise you will end up with a go install that
can only build for android/arm
On 22 Dec 2014 16:17, "Aditya Mukerjee" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Oh, and for posterity - this was on the machine running Arch, as Wheezy
> doesn't have glibc 2.14, which the NDK requires.
